attributes.action: Don't make changes to the EU Referendum Rules. Continue to LEAVE the EU.
attributes.additional_details: If there is a 2nd EU referendum and the Remain / Leave side win, and the turn out is 73% and not a 60/40 split is there going to be a 3rd/4th/5th referendum. This is going to cause more problems than solve.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government NOT to implement a rule that if the remain or leave vote is less than 60% based a turnout less than 75% there should be another referendum. A turnout of 75% has not been achieved in 24 years, let alone a 60/40 split.
